name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minus for Unsplash Â· Remove Unsplash+

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minus for Unsplash is a simple addon that lets you hide the Unsplash+ content from Unsplash.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unsplash used to be great! But since they introduced their new Unsplash+ service, browsing it has become a bit of a pain as it's now crowded with watermarked images blocked behind a pay wall. This extension aims to improve your Unsplash experience and get you more productive by getting rid of all that bloat. By turning Minus for Unsplash on, you will no longer see watermarked Unsplash+ images in your feed and will be able to focus on those that matter.

Notice: it is possible that Unsplash updates their site from time to time, which might break the addon. I can't really do anything about it since there's no way to predict the changes, but I should still be able to fix it quickly. If it happens please get in touch either by opening an issue on the GitHub repository or contact me by email ðŸ˜Š
long.fr:
Unsplash used to be great! But since they introduced their new Unsplash+ service, browsing it has become a bit of a pain as it's now crowded with watermarked images blocked behind a pay wall. This extension aims to improve your Unsplash experience and get you more productive by getting rid of all that bloat. By turning Unsplash Minus on, you will no longer see watermarked Unsplash+ images in your feed and will be able to focus on those that matter.

Notice: it is possible that Unsplash updates their site from time to time, which might break the addon. I can't really do anything about it since there's no way to predict the changes, but I should still be able to fix it quickly. If it happens please get in touch either by opening an issue on the GitHub repository or contact me by email ðŸ˜Š
